channel.title: Publications on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Landfried

item.title: Faithfulness-boost effect
item.description: Playing as a team with same partners enable us to acquire individual skills that would hardly be achieved by playing alone.

item.title: TrueSkill, Technical Report
item.description: The first skill estimator was developed by Arpad Elo, adopted by the World Chess Federations around 1970. TrueSkill is just the bayesian multiplayer version of Elo model, published by Microsoft in 2007. In this technical report I derive, step by step, the analytical solution of the model.
